title: The Todd Starnes Show – September 24th, 2019
text:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with Fox News Legal Analyst Gregg Jarrett about the Democrats using the Ukraine controversy as a way to push for impeachment.

Todd Starnes speaks with Ambassador at Large for International Religious Freedom Sam Brownback about President Trump's speech at the UN on religious freedom.

Todd speaks with Rep. Jody Hice (R-GA) about whether the Democrats will use the Ukraine controversy to push for the impeachment of President Trump.
